article.p: No matter where you go online, there is one thing that never changes, cat gifs. Cat gifs have been here forever and don't seem to be going anywhere anytime soon.
The only problem, it's the same gif over and over. It is always a cat jumping, sneezing, falling in water, or asking for a cheeseburger using terrible grammar.

Why can't people post gifs of cats galloping, or running through obstacle courses? Obviously because cats can't do these things. Have you seen a horse sneeze? It's much more impreseive than a cat sneeze. This is why pony gifs are superior.
